name: Butter Chicken Brawl
description:
Butter Chicken Brawl was made for the Jame Gam 23, with the theme of unintentional side effect and the special object of Butter Chicken. The Game is half cooking sim and half bullethell, where you if you feed your customers badly prepared food, unintended consequences will certainly follow. This is my first game jam, and there are likely several bugs, but none that I've seen are gamebreaking.

All Art and Code was made by me, and All of the SFX and Music was gotten from Pixabay.
